template_input_params.name: ansible_server_connection_user
template_input_params.label: Ansible Server Connection User
template_input_params.description: The user to connect to Ansible server.

template_input_params.name: ansible_server_connection_password
template_input_params.label: Ansible Server Connection Password
template_input_params.description: The password to connect to Ansible server.

template_input_params.name: ansible_server_ip
template_input_params.label: Ansible Server Ip
template_input_params.description: The IP or system name of the Ansible server.

template_input_params.name: ansible_working_directory
template_input_params.label: Ansible Working Directory
template_input_params.description: The working directory of Ansible. A new one is to be created if it doesn't exist.

template_input_params.name: repository_directory
template_input_params.label: Repository Directory
template_input_params.description: The library of repository system to store media files. An example is /QOpensys/repo.

template_input_params.name: ibmi_repo_user
template_input_params.label: Software repository user
template_input_params.description: The user to connect to software repository system.

template_input_params.name: ibmi_repo_password
template_input_params.label: Software repository password
template_input_params.description: The password to connect to the software repository system.

template_input_params.name: ibmi_repo_ip
template_input_params.label: Software repository ip
template_input_params.description: The IP or system name of the software repository system.

template_input_params.name: ansible_bin_path
template_input_params.label: Ansible Bin Path
template_input_params.description: The directory of ansible command. For example, /usr/local/bin/. Leave it as blank if ansible command is in PATH.

template_input_params.name: PTFs
template_input_params.label: PTFs
template_input_params.description: PTF packages to be installed. An example is C9123720

template_input_params.name: IBMi_systems
template_input_params.label: Ibmi Systems
template_input_params.description: Target IBMi to install PTFs. An example is '10.10.10.1 ansible_ssh_user=quser ansible_ssh_pass=pwd. If ssh has configured non-password login, ansible_ssh_password is optional.

template_input_params.name: NeedIPL
template_input_params.label: Need IPL or not
template_input_params.description: Need IPL target systems after PTF installation or not
